channel.title: Project Extient Dev. team
channel.description:
Hello, im Hippyss im starting a new server. Project Extient. It will be a Pk server, The starting location will be revealed in time :D. And im in need of a Development team the postitions needed are listed below. (2) Client Coders (Full) Server Coders (Full) Server Advertiser (unlm.)Graphic Artists
A list of Joined members [b]Client Coders[/b]
[ul][li]Open[/li] [li]Open[/li][/ul]
[b]Server Coders[/b]
[ul][li]Hippyss[/li] [li]Flame![/li] [li]Mod Robby[/li] [li]Newb 2142[/li][/ul]
[b]Graphics Artists[/b]
[ul][li]Sick of Air[/li] [li]Open[/li][/ul]
[b]Server Advertiser[/b]
[ul][li]PlanPlan[/li][/ul]
Use this format when applying for a position Or add me on msn run3scapevideos@yahoo.com [code]Name: Your name here Postition wanted: Position desired here Experence in this position:(alot,some,minimal,none)(include what you specialise in too). Servers / Clients coded: [i]Examples of your work[/i] [/code] After you have been exepted register an account on http://projectextient.smfforfree3.com Then wait a few minutes for me to upgrade you to the desired position on the forums. Thanks, Hippyss [u][b]Also please note this is the recruitment portion The actual development will not begin untill about 05\18\07 at around 6:00pm eastern and pacific.[/b][/u]

just gonna make your a cool layout with server name,features,blah,blah,blah.PM what youw want me to do if you choose the anwer yes.[/quote]
